localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: BitsForDigits is the worldâ€™s #1 partial buyout marketplace. We make it anonymous, easy and free for founders to sell minority and majority stakes to professional investors. List your business today to get offers from the +100 investors already on the platform!
nodes.title: BitsForDigits - A partial buyout marketplace free for bootstrapped founders
nodes.author: Maximilian Fleitmann

nodes.excerpt: Getting funding for your startup is hard, but there are hundreds of companies helping you with your fundraising efforts. This map is a visual overview of every player in the fundraising ecosystem.
nodes.title: Fundraising Market Map - Visual overview of all tools that can be used to raise money
nodes.author: Maximilian Fleitmann

nodes.excerpt: The knowledge gap in founders and founding teams to build on and scale their ideas is real, expensive and time-consuming. This gap hurt our ideas, confidence and ambition! Hence Foundersâ€™ Book to support their venture building process.
nodes.title: Founders' Book 2.0 - World's largest library of tools and resources for founders
nodes.author: Goutham Bandaru

nodes.excerpt: Jessica Livingston's book "Founders at work" (2007, 32 stories) inspired thousands of founders to start startup. I find 150+ founders stories to inspire new wave of founders. I hope, that FoundersAtWork.io saves 50-100 hours for 1000+ new founders.
nodes.title: Founders at work - Curated collection of 150+ YC Startup Founders Stories
nodes.author: Alex Stacenko

nodes.excerpt: 60 easy-to-edit Figma pitch deck slides. Created based on the real experience of raising $1M and getting accepted to Techstars London Accelerator. Get your free pitch deck templates ğŸ’›
nodes.title: Startup Pitch Deck Templates - 60 Figma templates + real pitch decks from Techstars startup
nodes.author: Lisa Dziuba

nodes.excerpt: FounderResources.io is a curated list of 500+ resources, templates & tools that help you on your journey to build a successful business. You can easily filter all resources by category and type to quickly find the thing you are looking for.
nodes.title: Founder Resources - 500+ curated resources, templates & tools for startups
nodes.author: Maximilian Fleitmann

nodes.excerpt: The success of Netflix's Squid Game made us question to what extent the Startup world, including its investors and companies, are trapped in one of the 7 Squid Games from the show. Find out for yourself which squid game your company is trapped in.
nodes.title: Is Your Startup Trapped in a Squid Game? - Find out how the Market makes your Startup play by its rules
nodes.author: Saksham Sharda

nodes.excerpt: Meet Product Design Process E-book for early-stage startups, the most comprehensive guide to creating an intuitive design. There is a smooth overview of the double-diamond model, that helps you create intuitive app design and satisfy inner usersâ€™ desires
nodes.title: Product Design Guide for Startups - Learn to design app that reach business goal and users needs
nodes.author: Andriy Bas

nodes.excerpt: SandHill.io aggregates the latest content from the blogs, substacks, and medium feeds of 600+ VCs and industry-focused startup analysts. Each weekâ€™s top analyses are shared via the weekly newsletter â€“ https://newsletter.sandhill.io/
nodes.title: SandHill.io - The latest startup theses & insights from 600+ VCs

nodes.excerpt: Entrepreneurship Cell VIT is a student body that fosters an entrepreneurial spirit amongst students. With StartupHub we want to give everyone a starting point and adequate resources to become a part of the startup ecosystem and become entrepreneurs.
nodes.title: Startup Hub by E-Cell VIT - Discover resources that help you join the startup ecosystem
nodes.author: Aaditya Pareek

nodes.excerpt: We've gathered advice from the best startup CEOs, recruiters, and hiring managers on how to land your next role in the startup world.
nodes.title: 30 Day Job Hunting Bootcamp by Pearl - A new text message each day with expert advice
nodes.author: Tim Connors

nodes.excerpt: An interactive course series for founders who want to scale their business. By this course, you will learn OKR methodology from scratch, OKR philosophy and how to implement to your company. For people who are sick of endless books and blogs about OKR.
nodes.title: OKR Starter Package - Interactive and fun OKR courses, no more endless blogs
nodes.author: Emre Akyol

nodes.excerpt: Hey there! We created this simple guide to help startups demystify and adopt OKRs. It's divided in 4 parts: - OKRs principles - Getting started with OKRs - Tracking OKRs - Tutorials - Resources (including templates) Hope this helps!
nodes.title: OKRs for Startups - A practical guide on OKRs including templates and tutorials
nodes.author: Sten

nodes.excerpt: Product Managers face the biggest challenges of our day, which is why our community needs a common set of product principles. After many months of collaborative development, itâ€™s time to introduce the Product Manifesto!
nodes.title: The Product Manifesto - Up-to-date values and principles for product people

nodes.title: Bootstrapping Guide by Jotform - From 0 to 10 Million Users with $0 Funding

nodes.excerpt: Distributed work makes it hard to let your team (and online friends!) know how much you appreciate them. Show off your team (or anyone else in your network!) by nominating them for a Startup Yearbook superlative.
nodes.title: Startup Yearbook - A fun way to show appreciation to online friends
